verses.verse: But God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> that were with him in the ark; <S%H8392><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> caused a wind <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the water <S%H4325><s%> subsided. <S%H7918><s%>

Also the fountains <S%H4599><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> and the floodgates <S%H699><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> were closed, <S%H5534><s%> and the rain <S%H1653><s%> from the sky <S%H8064><s%> was restrained; <S%H3607><s%>

and the water <S%H4325><s%> receded <S%H7725><s%> steadily <S%H1980><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> and at the end <S%H7097><s%> of one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> decreased. <S%H2637><s%>

And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Ararat. <S%H780><s%>

And the water <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%> steadily <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> became <S%H7200><s%> visible. <S%H7200><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that Noah <S%H5146><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had made; <S%H6213><s%>

and he sent <S%H7971><s%> out a raven, <S%H6158><s%> and it flew <S%H3318><s%> here <S%H3318><s%> and there <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> was dried <S%H3001><s%> up from the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Then he sent <S%H7971><s%> out a dove <S%H3123><s%> from him, to see <S%H7200><s%> if the water <S%H4325><s%> was abated <S%H7043><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the land; <S%H127><s%>

but the dove <S%H3123><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> resting <S%H4494><s%> place <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot, <S%H7272><s%> so she returned <S%H7725><s%> to him into the ark; <S%H8392><s%> for the water <S%H4325><s%> was on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> Then he put <S%H7971><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> her, and brought <S%H935><s%> her into the ark <S%H8392><s%> to himself.

So he waited <S%H9123><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> another <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and again <S%H3254><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> out the dove <S%H3123><s%> from the ark. <S%H8392><s%>

And the dove <S%H3123><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to him toward evening; <S%H6153><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> in her beak <S%H6310><s%> was a freshly <S%H2965><s%> picked <S%H2965><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> leaf. <S%H5929><s%> So Noah <S%H5146><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that the water <S%H4325><s%> was abated <S%H7043><s%> from the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then he waited <S%H3176><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> another <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> out the dove; <S%H3123><s%> but she did not return <S%H7725><s%> to him again. <S%H3254><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and first <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the first <S%H259><s%> of the month, the water <S%H4325><s%> was dried <S%H9162><s%> up from the earth. <S%H776><s%> Then Noah <S%H5146><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was dried <S%H9162><s%> up.
And in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the twenty-seventh day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was dry. <S%H3001><s%>
Then God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Go <S%H3318><s%> out of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> you and your wife <S%H802><s%> and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your sons' wives <S%H802><s%> with you.

"Bring <S%H3318><s%> out with you every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H9130><s%> thing <S%H9130><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is with you, birds <S%H5775><s%> and animals <S%H929><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing <S%H7431><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> that they may breed <S%H8317><s%> abundantly <S%H8317><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
So Noah <S%H5146><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons' wives <S%H802><s%> with him.

Every <S%H3605><s%> beast, <S%H9130><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing, <S%H7431><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> bird, <S%H5775><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> that moves <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out by their families <S%H4940><s%> from the ark. <S%H8392><s%>

Then Noah <S%H5146><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> smelled <S%H9552><s%> the soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Himself, <S%H3820><s%> "I will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> on account <S%H5668><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> for the intent <S%H3336><s%> of man's heart <S%H3820><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> from his youth; <S%H5271><s%> and I will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> destroy <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing, <S%H2416><s%> as I have done. <S%H6213><s%>

"While <S%H5750><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> remains, <S%H5750><s%> Seedtime <S%H2233><s%> and harvest, <S%H7105><s%> And cold <S%H7120><s%> and heat, <S%H2527><s%> And summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter, <S%H2779><s%> And day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> Shall not cease. <S%H7673><s%>"
